articles.author: David Lawder, Greta Fondahn
articles.description: Top U.S. and Chinese economic officials met in Stockholm on Monday for more than five hours of talks aimed at resolving longstanding economic disputes at the centre of a trade war between the world's top two economies, seeking to extend a truce by three months.
articles.title: US, China hold new talks on tariff truce, easing path for Trump-Xi meeting
